desc.cn: GoAccess 是一种开源实时网络日志分析仪和交互式查看器，它在 *nix 系统中或通过浏览器中运行
desc.en: GoAccess is an open source real-time web log analyzer and interactive viewer that runs in a terminal in *nix systems or through your browser

debian/wget.cmd:
wget -O - https://deb.goaccess.io/gnugpg.key | gpg --dearmor | sudo tee /usr/share/keyrings/goaccess.gpg >/dev/null && \
echo "deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/goaccess.gpg arch=$(dpkg --print-architecture)] https://deb.goaccess.io/ $(lsb_release -cs) main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/goaccess.list && \
sudo apt-get update && \
sudo apt-get install goaccess

ubuntu/wget.cmd:
wget -O - https://deb.goaccess.io/gnugpg.key | gpg --dearmor | sudo tee /usr/share/keyrings/goaccess.gpg >/dev/null && \
echo "deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/goaccess.gpg arch=$(dpkg --print-architecture)] https://deb.goaccess.io/ $(lsb_release -cs) main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/goaccess.list && \
sudo apt-get update && \
sudo apt-get install goaccess

freebsd/pkg.cmd:
cd /usr/ports/sysutils/goaccess/ && \
make install clean && \
pkg install sysutils/goaccess

openbsd/pkg.cmd:
cd /usr/ports/www/goaccess && \
make install clean && \
pkg_add goaccess

opensuse/zypper.cmd:
zypper ar -f obs://server:http http && \
zypper in goaccess
